Actions to Take When a Custodian Ceases to Have Custody of a Child Beneficiary
If the authorization activity learns that a custodian recognized under
38 U.S.C. 5502
ceases to have custody of a child beneficiary,
submit
VA Form 21-592
to the hub of jurisdiction.
When preparing the form,
furnish detailed information as to the status of the child’s custody, and
include any information on the suitability of a parent to act as the child’s custodian.
